fer.ai

Class AiPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • fer.ai.AiPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class AiPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Author:
    Evan Stewart A class containing a set of methods that act upon a map in order to process computer player movement. Each player contains a set of parameters that determine how it will act based on certain circumstances.

      • getAttackableUnits

        public java.util.ArrayList<Unit> getAttackableUnits(Unit attacker)
        Generates a list of all units that the specified attacker may attack within a single turn. Runs a PathFinder to get the attackable tiles available for the unit for each of the tiles it may move to during a turn and scans these tiles for non-duplicate units with range of the attacker's longest-range weapon. Due to frequent use of the PathFinder, this method may cause lag.
        Parameters:
        attacker - The unit to determine attackable units for
        Returns:
        An arraylist of all the units the attacker may attack within a single turn
